General.Name: Jiangsu Province Commun
General.Description: China Design Group Co., Ltd. provides engineering survey and design services in China. It offers design and research, comprehensive planning research, transportation, water transport and conservancy, urban construction, railway planning and design research, smart industry, engineering general contracting, ecology and environmental protection, planning, project consulting, survey and design, project management, inspection and monitoring, professional construction, and operation management solution. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Province Communications Planning and Design Institute Limited Company and changed its name to China Design Group Co., Ltd. in July 2016. China Design Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Mr. Bing  Juan
6.Title: Director & Sec. of the Board of Directors
